name: Aspiring
description: Aspiring angler: No experience yet, but interested in the sport or learning more about marine life!

name: Novice
description: Novice angler: Takes part in angling but has limited experience. Interested in learning more about marine life!

name: Proficient
description: Proficient angler: Proficient angler takes part in angling for leisure and sport. Interested in teaching and helping other anglers and intake more information with marine life!
